description:
Drifting an airport bus on a runway? Thatâ€™s only one of the exciting things awaiting you here! Dive into a huge location with lots of cool stuff to do, discover a race track, an off-road area and more!

Game features:
- Realistic airport, race track and city environments
- Lots of surprises to discover
- 20 awesome cars
- 100 exciting missions
- Realistic traffic

During your time with the game you will drive amazing Sports Sars, SUVs, Luxury Limousines, Supercars, 4x4s and Airport Buses! Push them to their limits and see what you can squeeze out of them!

The huge Airport location is filled with details and exciting areas to find. There are loads of car parks and hotels in close vicinity. If you venture a little bit further, you will discover an international Race Track with an off-road area for the craziest exploits.
name: Car Driver Ultimate
